name: Let it Goat 2 - GOAT CLAN RACING
name_original: Let it Goat 2 - GOAT CLAN RACING
description:
The most epic fun run with your favorite Goats from the hit game Let it Goat! Choose from Mounty, Gelsa, Gappy, and many others, shop for troll items and race on 12 new maps with more coming.

New Features:
Clans with Clan Chat
Leaderboards
New Troll Items: Lightning, Saws, Magnets

Let it Goat CLASSIC is still available as a 100% free app.
